entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 1:56 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: E 41 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
